references: J. W. Moon, Some enumerative results on series-parallel networks, Annals Discrete Math., 33 (1987), 199-226.

J. Riordan and C. E. Shannon, The number of two-terminal series-parallel networks, J. Math. Phys., 21 (1942), 83-93. Reprinted in Claude Elwood Shannon: Collected Papers, edited by N. J. A. Sloane and A. D. Wyner, IEEE Press, NY, 1993, pp. 560-570.
links: O. Golinelli, Asymptotic behavior of two-terminal series-parallel networks, arXiv:cond-mat/9707023 [cond-mat.stat-mech], 1997.
formula: This number, c, is defined by Product_{n=1..inf} (1-c^n)^(-A000669[n]) = 2.
crossrefs: See A058965 for continued fraction expansion. Cf. A000084, A000669.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, E. M. Rains, Jan 14 2001
